Description: Body and handle sherd of South Ionian pottery cup with everted rim; interior: glazed black; exterior: reserved save for lip; black on top and sides of handle; inscription on exterior. Much mica.
Curator's comments: For parallels regarding the fabric, see British Museum 1886,0401.338.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GE.209) (Phase 3)
